content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(0.5, 6.0)
Consists of boiler (position 0.5, 6.0) and steam engine (position 0.5, 0.5). The boiler is intended to convert fuel into steam, which powers the steam engine for electricity generation.

### Copper plate factory at position(-5.0, -65.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (position -5.0, -65.0) which is processing iron ore into iron plates.
- Multiple wooden chests (positions 46.5, -83.5; 48.5, -83.5; 5.5, -79.5; 10.5, -79.5) for storage of resources.

### Copper plate mine at position(47.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position 47.0, -82.0) extracting iron ore.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing Offshore Pump
- Cannot place Offshore Pump as it is not in inventory. Ensure the Offshore Pump is in your inventory before attempting to place it.

### Errors when connecting Boiler to Steam Engine
- No pipes available. We cannot connect the Boiler to the Steam Engine. Make sure to have pipes in your inventory to connect these entities.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
